bio: I am a passionate software developer from Brazil with over 10 years of experience. During this time, I found that my real drive lies in building products by creating apps with great visuals, high-quality code base and amazing user experience. This also means helping to create and maintain a solid product vision.
check_out_resume: You can check out my resume
hatch_description: Hatch is a platform that helps people start working together in just a few seconds. Using this app you can create a contract, track time and get paid.
activite_description_1: Activite Personal is a companion app for Personal Trainers to help with their daily routine by allowing them to create fitness assessments of their clients. It was built using Flutter, supporting both Android and iOS.
activite_description_2: I'm extremely proud of the work I did on this project, especially because I was able to work on everything related to it: the app itself, API, UX, design, website and marketing.
activite_description_3: Unfortunately it was discontinued in late 2022.
blog_1: This is something very recent for me, but I've been enjoying it a lot!
blog_2: My intent with this is to share my experiences as a developer, create interesting tutorials and give tips and tricks to hopefully help other people.
contact_form_1: Got any questions, a proposal or only want to say hi?
contact_form_2: Just fill the form below, I would love to talk to you!
name: Name
